Detailed Description

Superclass for packets with push contents.

PosSizeComment
REQUEST_HEADER_SIZE 4 bytes serviceID
REQUEST_HEADER_SIZE + 4 4 bytes timeStamp

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

PushPacket::PushPacket (  uint32  bufSize,
uint16  subType,
uint32  mapID,
uint32  serviceID,
uint32  timeStamp
) 
 

Constructor.

Parameters:
bufSize The size of the packet buffer.
subType The type of packet.
mapID The map id if mapID:s are used. If map id:s are not used it shoud be MAX_UINT32.
serviceID The service ID for the push service.
timeStamp Time of newest update in packet.
